name: Recall
tagline: Chat with everything you’ve read, heard, watched, or noted
description: Go beyond your brain’s limits. Chat with all the content you read, watch, listen to, or take notes on. Add content on the go or import thousands of videos, podcasts, and more—all saved to your self-organizing knowledge base. Your memory, searchable forever.

name: Airbook AI
tagline: Cursor for Analytics
description: Airbook AI connects to your CRMs, marketing, support, and product databases - understands your schema, auto-writes SQL, joins across sources, creates charts, builds dashboards, and activates workflows - In one place, on command.

name: Finden
tagline: AI workspace to unify, automate, and run your business
description: Finden is your AI workspace for all your data, across drives, devices, and applications. Organize files, enrich your data, chat with your data, and automatically find what matters in your Memory Bank.

name: v0.app by Vercel
tagline: The AI builder for everyone
description: v0.app is your collaborative AI assistant to design, iterate, and scale full-stack applications for the web.

name: PopHop
tagline: Turn your audience into an active economy
description: PopHop helps creators and course builders go beyond passive followers. By turning their audience into a thriving, paywalled community. Built for simplicity and speed, PopHop lets you launch a gated community in minutes. No tech skills needed.

name: Sellinger AI
tagline: Autonomous AI LinkedIn Outreach
description: Fully automated conversational AI for LinkedIn outreach, end to end. Chases down your leads, holds indistinguishable-from-real chats, manages follow ups, and fills your calendar with the right meetings, visits, and sign ups with no manual workflows.

name: Nowadays
tagline: AI-Powered Events, Built on Community
description: Nowadays is your AI copilot for corporate events. Just add your event details and we’ll handle venue outreach and negotiations. Meet AVA, your AI assistant — share your venue experience out loud and she’ll capture every detail, no typing required.

name: Codédex v1.0
tagline: Start your coding adventure ⋆˙⟡
description: The same Codédex known and loved by 1M+ users just lvl’ed up. 🚀 Embark on an epic journey through the fantasy land of Python, HTML, CSS, JS, SQL, GitHub, AI, and more. Earn XP to unlock new regions, collect badges – all while learning at your own pace. 👾

name: Trufflow
tagline: Map how software gets used across teams
description: Trufflow helps you map how internal software gets used across teams. Track usage, adoption, and dependencies to understand how apps support work across teams and where they deliver the most impact.

name: Cobot
tagline: The first to-do app that does it for you.
description: Cobot is your AI teammate for getting work done. It automates the tools you already use, like Gmail, Notion, and Google Calendar, so you can save time follow-ups, managing your calendar, and task management.

name: What To Build
tagline: Concept to discover & analyze relevant open-source projects
description: Get AI-powered project ideas, find similar repositories, and get a visual plan to build it.

name: Enigma X
tagline: Your own encryption in any messenger
description: Enigma X lets you encrypt messages, photos, and videos BEFORE they hit any messenger app. Now you control the keys, not messengers. Features a custom keyboard that encrypts your input before it touches a field of messenger.

name: AdDojo
tagline: Go from raw footage to viral ads in seconds
description: AdDojo turns hours of raw footage into viral social media content automatically. Our AI finds the best moments and creates posts optimized for Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn. Search your videos by typing "people laughing" to find exact moments instantly.

name: Ikiform
tagline: An open-source alternative to Google Forms and Typeform
description: Create beautiful forms with Ikiform - An open-source alternative to Google Forms. Build surveys, collect responses, and analyze data effortlessly.

name: Uplyt Copilot
tagline: AI Analytics that fixes your Google Analytics headache
description: Uplyt is your AI copilot for web analytics. Connect GA4, Google Ads, and more to turn web data into clear, actionable insights. Collaborate with your team, assign missions, and track results. All without the GA4 headache!

name: Leads Ward
tagline: Stop bad leads with AI-powered form filtering for businesses
description: Leads Ward is an intelligent AI lead filtering service that acts as an invisible bouncer for your website forms. Our AI analyzes form submissions in real-time, scoring lead quality from 1-100, and only allows genuine prospects to reach your CRM or inbox

name: Myriade
tagline: Ask your data. See the SQL. Self-host in one command.
description: Myriade is an agentic AI data analyst you can self-host. Connect Postgres/MySQL/Snowflake/BigQuery, ask in plain English, and review/edit the SQL and charts. Privacy-first (read-only, no data retention). Try a live demo—no login. One-line Docker to deploy.

name: AppLink by AppsOnAir
tagline: Firebase Dynamic Links Alternative
description: AppLink is the smartest drop-in replacement for Firebase Dynamic Links. Enjoy seamless deep linking, deferred routing, custom domains, real-time analytics, and easy migration. Built for developers, marketers, and modern mobile teams.

name: Mobile App Help Center SDK by HelpKit
tagline: Add a Notion powered help desk to your mobile app
description: Add a native help center to your mobile app in minutes. Write docs in Notion, embed with HelpKit's Mobile SDKs, and watch support tickets drop by 60-80%. Support for React Native, Swift and more. Your users get instant answers without ever leaving your app.

name: SocialRails
tagline: Create content, post everywhere
description: Create content, and schedule posts to 9 social media platforms. ✨ Generate short-form content ✨ Get daily content ideas (specifically for your brand) ✨ Setup auto-recurring posts ✨ Post quality checks ✨ Post to X communities ✨ Up to 25 workspaces

tagline: Chat with everything you’ve read, heard, watched, or noted
description: Go beyond your brain’s limits. Chat with all the content you read, watch, listen to, or take notes on. Add content on the go or import thousands of videos, podcasts, and more—all saved to your self-organizing knowledge base. Your memory, searchable forever.
